metadata.creator: Ashok Khosla
metadata.description:
These xlsx files are data encodings of all legible Andean Khipu identified by Ashok Khosla for the Khipu Field Guide. They are an important and useful resource to anyone looking to study Khipu and Andean communication systems.

All of these files are the product of Ashok Khosla's work for the Khipu Field Guide. It is highly recommended that you visit the site for the Khipu Field Guide as it has many more resources that make the use of these files easier -
https://www.khipufieldguide.com/
